## WorkspaceAudio.play() method

Play a named sound at specified volume. If volume is not specified, use full volume (1).

**Signature:**

```typescript
play(name: string, opt_volume?: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Name of sound. |
|  opt\_volume | number | _(Optional)_ Volume of sound (0-1). |

**Returns:**

void
